props.name: children
props.description: Anything which can be rendered in a dropdown

props.name: className
props.description: Classes applied to root element of dropdown

props.name: dropdownItems
props.description: Array of DropdownItem nodes that will be rendered in the dropdown Menu list

props.name: isOpen
props.description: Flag to indicate if menu is opened

props.name: isPlain
props.description: Display the toggle with no border or background

props.name: position
props.description: Indicates where menu will be aligned horizontally

props.name: direction
props.description: Display menu above or below dropdown toggle

props.name: toggle
props.description: Placeholder to use custom toggle elements

props.name: onSelect
props.description: Function callback called when user selects item
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: children
props.description: Anything which can be rendered as dropdown item

props.name: className
props.description: Classes applied to root element of dropdown item

props.name: component
props.description: Indicates which component will be used as dropdown item

props.name: isDisabled
props.description: Render dropdown item as disabled option

props.name: isHovered
props.description: Forces display of the hover state of the element

props.name: href
props.description: Default hyperlink location
Additional props are spread to the container component

props.name: onClick
props.description: Callback for click event

props.name: children
props.description: Anything which can be rendered as dropdown items

props.name: className
props.description: Classess applied to root element of dropdown menu

props.name: isOpen
props.description: Flag to indicate if menu is opened

props.name: component
props.description: Indicates which component will be used as dropdown menu

props.name: position
props.description: Indicates where menu will be alligned horizontally
Additional props are spread to the container component

props.name: id
props.description: HTML ID of dropdown toggle

props.name: children
props.description: Anything which can be rendered as dropdown toggle button

props.name: className
props.description: Classes applied to root element of dropdown toggle button

props.name: isOpen
props.description: Flag to indicate if menu is opened

props.name: onToggle
props.description: Callback called when toggle is clicked

props.name: parentRef
props.description: Element which wraps toggle

props.name: isFocused
props.description: Forces focus state

props.name: isHovered
props.description: Forces hover state

props.name: isActive
props.description: Forces active state

props.name: isPlain
props.description: Display the toggle with no border or background

props.name: iconComponent
props.description: The icon to display for the toggle. Defaults to CaretDownIcon. Set to null to not show an icon.

props.name: splitButtonItems
props.description: Elements to display before the toggle button. When included, renders the toggle as a split button.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Accessible label for the dropdown toggle button
Additional props are spread to the container component

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the DropdownToggleCheckbox

props.name: isValid
props.description: Flag to show if the checkbox selection is valid or invalid

props.name: isDisabled
props.description: Flag to show if the checkbox is disabled

props.name: isChecked
props.description: Flag to show if the checkbox is checked

props.name: onChange
props.description: A callback for when the checkbox selection changes

props.name: id
props.description: Id of the checkbox

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Aria-label of the checkbox
Additional props are spread to the <input>
